pci_app_update_app_port_message_1: You can now change your application port. Your current configuration of other elements will also be retained, such as your HTTP endpoint or deployment strategy.
pci_app_update_app_port_message_2: Please note that there may be some lag on your various replica nodes if you use an auto-scaling deployment strategy.
pci_app_update_app_port_input_port_help_: Enter the new HTTP port on which you want to deploy your app
pci_app_update_app_port_error: An error has occurred updating your {{appName}} app’s HTTP port: {{message}}
